dct_description_sm: World map with distances by sea from England to various points; relief shown pictorially. In margin: II. Plate II from: General atlas of the world ... / engraved on steel ... by Sidney Hall, William Hughes ... &c. New edition. Edinburgh : Adam and Charles Black ... , 1854.
dct_publisher_sm: Edinburgh : Published by A. & C. Black, [1854]
